title: Unelectable
author: VD
content_html:
From NRO:

A new Gallup poll shows Republicans losing in every 2008 national matchup with Democrats. Here they are:

50 Clinton
46 Giuliani

49 Clinton
46 McCain

53 Clinton
40 Romney

50 Obama
45 Giuliani

48 Obama
46 McCain

57 Obama
36 Romney

50 Edwards
45 Giuliani

50 Edwards
44 McCain

61 Edwards
32 Romney

Based on the all-powerful polls, you’d think the Republican leadership might consider it be worth looking at the one candidate who has the benefit of being in tune with the overwhelming majority of Americans on the two primary issues in this election cycle. But no, it’s much better to be pragmatic than principled.
